patthana21.5:4.1: Naappaccayaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:5.1: Naappaccayaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:6.1: Naappaccayaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:6.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.5:8.1: Nasanidassanaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:9.1: Nasanidassanaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:10.1: Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:10.2: Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:10.3: Nasanidassanaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato ca anidassano abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:10.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.5:11.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:12.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:13.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:13.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.5:14.1: Naarūpiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:15.1: Naarūpiṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:16.1: Narūpiṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:16.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.5:17.1: Nalokuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:17.2: Nalokuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:18.1: Nalokuttaraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:19.1: Nalokiyaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:19.2: Nalokuttaraṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:19.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana21.5:20.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana21.5:21.1: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana21.5:22.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nakusalañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana21.5:23.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:23.2: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:24.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.5:24.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
